mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY notice_seq) AS rowNum, notice_seq, member_id, password, title, content, writeTime, views FROM notice WHERE isDeleted = 0 ORDER BY notice_seq DESC
SELECT notice_seq AS noticeSeq, member_id AS memberId, password, title, content, writeTime, views FROM notice WHERE notice_seq=#{noticeSeq} AND isDeleted = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET views = views + 1 WHERE notice_seq=#{noticeSeq} AND isDeleted = 0
